overview: Steve Booth joined Aria Systems in 2008 as the Vice President of Sales. Steve is responsible for setting Aria’s sales strategy and driving revenue growth through enterprise customer base expansion. Steve is a seasoned sales executive, bringing over 20 years of enterprise solution sales and sales management experience to Aria. Prior to joining Aria, Steve held senior sales management positions with QlikTech, Responsys, ADP, and Portal Software. Steve holds a BS in Marketing and Finance from LaSalle University.
